Prompt.pre_question_prompt: I am an expert instructional designer. I will ask some questions to collect information and then I will use the information to rate the course between preliminary, novice, and expert.
Prompt.task_specific_prompt: Write a rating (preliminary, novice, expert) the course using the questions and answers above. Rating should not be more than 1 sentence.

QApair.Question: What are the objectives of the course?
QApair.Answer: To teach advanced database management systems to students.

QApair.Question: What is the target audience for the course?
QApair.Answer: Students with prior experience working with databases and have been dealing with PL/SQL for at least one year.

QApair.Question: What is the expected outcome of the course?
QApair.Answer: Students will be able to design efficient database management systems for large corporates.

QApair.Question: What is the structure of the course?
QApair.Answer: The course is divided into theory based lectures and hands-on labs.

QApair.Question: What is the difficulty level of the course?
QApair.Answer: The course difficulty is high.

QApair.Question: What are the prerequisites for the course?
QApair.Answer: Students must have prior experience with PL/SQL and building database schemas which have tightly coupled tables.

QApair.Question: What are the assessment methods used in the course?
QApair.Answer: Students will have to complete 2 projects and 8 assignments based on which they will be assessed.

QApair.Question: What is the pass percentage for the course?
QApair.Answer: 65% is the pass percentage.

QApair.Question: What is the duration of the course?
QApair.Answer: Duration of the course is 8 weeks.

QApair.Question: What is the frequency of the course?
QApair.Answer: Classes are conducted every week on Monday & Tuesday.

Instances.Output: This course is rated as expert.

QApair.Question: What are the objectives of the course?
QApair.Answer: To help working professionals understand the how to respond to fire accidents at their workplace.

QApair.Question: What is the target audience for the course?
QApair.Answer: Employees of corporates working on-site where fire hazards are possible.

QApair.Question: What is the expected outcome of the course?
QApair.Answer: Upon completion of the course, students will be able to confidently handle fire accidents and bring themselves to safety.

QApair.Question: What is the structure of the course?
QApair.Answer: The course is divided into theory based lectures, drills and hands-on practice sessions.

QApair.Question: What is the difficulty level of the course?
QApair.Answer: The course difficulty is low.

QApair.Question: What are the prerequisites for the course?
QApair.Answer: No prerequisites for this course.

QApair.Question: What are the assessment methods used in the course?
QApair.Answer: Final evacuation drill.

QApair.Question: What is the pass percentage for the course?
QApair.Answer: 90% is the pass percentage.

QApair.Question: What is the duration of the course?
QApair.Answer: Duration of the course is 2 weeks.

QApair.Question: What is the frequency of the course?
QApair.Answer: Classes are conducted every day between 5 to 6 PM.

QApair.Question: What are the objectives of the course?
QApair.Answer: To help students understand managerial economics and accounting.

QApair.Question: What is the target audience for the course?
QApair.Answer: Working professionals who need to plan future plans of an organisation based on existing market trends and economic situations.

QApair.Question: What is the expected outcome of the course?
QApair.Answer: Students will be equipped with skills to assess the current economic conditions to make best out of them to help their organisations grow.

QApair.Question: What is the structure of the course?
QApair.Answer: The course is primarily deliver through lectures.

QApair.Question: What is the difficulty level of the course?
QApair.Answer: The course difficulty is above average.

QApair.Question: What are the prerequisites for the course?
QApair.Answer: Strong foundation in economics for this course.

QApair.Question: What are the assessment methods used in the course?
QApair.Answer: Mid-term and final exams

QApair.Question: What is the pass percentage for the course?
QApair.Answer: 50% is the pass percentage.

QApair.Question: What is the duration of the course?
QApair.Answer: Duration of the course is 8 weeks.

QApair.Question: What is the frequency of the course?
QApair.Answer: Classes are conducted every week on Monday & Friday.

Instances.Output: The course is rated as preliminary.
